messages: 22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:04): is preparing a teleconference
4e63bbbffbcaf12608512401eaf11240 (21:04): logging to http://www.w3.org/2010/08/25-webapps-irc
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:04): 4e63bbbffbcaf12608512401eaf11240, make logs public
4e63bbbffbcaf12608512401eaf11240 (21:04): I have made the request, 22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:04): 17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf, this will be DOM3
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:04): ok, 22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592, I see IA_WebApps(DOM3)2:00PM already started
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:05): Meeting: Web Applications Working Group Teleconference
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:05): ok, 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6; the call is being made
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:05): +Shepazu
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (21:10): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: we have the meeting?
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (21:10): and sorry, I'm a bit late
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:12): +[IPcaller]
0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c (21:13): 17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf, [IPcaller] is Olli_Pettay
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:13): +Olli_Pettay; got it
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:14): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: I know of two outstanding issues
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:14): ... 1) ContextInfo sections need to be checked and fixed if necessary
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:14): ... 2) composition events implementation feedback
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:14): ... other than that, I think we're ready to publish.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:15): ... I expect there will be feedback that we'll need integrate after last call, and possibly a second last call.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:15): ... but we can take these comments and integrate them.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:15): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c: We had talked earlier about publishing a WD first, then issuing the Last Call
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:16): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Yes, we could that because WD get better review than editor's draft.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:16): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c: I see in many bugs, that people are looking at the last (outdated) WD.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:17): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: It would be ideal to go from WD to LastCall, but to get this shipped it makes sense to go straight there.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:17): ... we should have been pushing every three months, but haven't kept up.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:18): ... I will ask the working group to go to last call, with certain known issues, and the expectation that we will take last-call comments seriously.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:18): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c: How are last call comments different from WD comments?
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:19): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Last call comments need to be tracked and resolved by the group. We have to ensure that we close the loop on commenters.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:20): ... We understand that there are potential (old) issues, that we'd like to make official last call comments.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:20): ... Timing is a factor here too, relative to Doug's upcoming schedule.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:21): ... We want to make sure we collect the comments.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:21): ... We will probably have a second last call (shorter) becuase hopefully we have addressed all the issues.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:22): ACTION: 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 to update composition events and contextinfo sections before this Friday (8/27/2010)
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:22): noticed an ACTION. Trying to create it.
4e63bbbffbcaf12608512401eaf11240 (21:22): records action 1
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:22): Created ACTION-571 - Update composition events and contextinfo sections before this Friday (8/27/2010) [on Doug Schepers - due 2010-09-01].
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:22): ACTION: 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 to request Last Call transition from the Web Apps Working Group
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:22): noticed an ACTION. Trying to create it.
4e63bbbffbcaf12608512401eaf11240 (21:22): records action 2
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:22): Created ACTION-572 - Request Last Call transition from the Web Apps Working Group [on Doug Schepers - due 2010-09-01].
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:26): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: I added a definition for event order and a section that relates to event loops.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:27): d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7: That section looks good to me.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:29): 0c8dce20967cf80665e60051b8ab2d3c: The event loop does not seem relevant to the DOM Events spec
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:30): ... We should be careful that we don't imply that the event loop concept is a DOM Events spec feature.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:44): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Are there any other outstanding issues that need to be addressed (other than the two aforementioned ones)?
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:44): d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7: None. I expect we'll have a few last call comments
